name: OH&S: Occupational Health and Sabotage
description:
You've been fired from your job at the fragile untempered glass factory.

You told your boss the loose glass was a safety hazard.

He told you anyone dumb enough to get hurt deserved it.

Time to show him just how dumb you are.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

OH&S is a game about jumping through glass to fuck with your boss who just fired you. 

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • Shift to sprint
  • Mouse to look around at things
  • Scroll wheel to zoom in and out

You can also get this game by subscribing to my Patreon. You'll also get access to all the other games I've released on Patreon.
